channel.title: 彭博-市场
channel.description: 这是一个追踪彭博-市场news的种子

item.title: 香港刚刚以创纪录的速度通过了本地安全法，既安抚了北京，又与西方政府对立。现在，香港面临着巩固其国际金融中心地位的艰巨任务。
item.description:
Hong Kong just passed its local security law at record speed, placating Beijing and antagonizing Western governments. It now has the challenging task of bolstering the city’s position as an international finance center. https://t.co/v4XBZi8Yyc

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 20, 2024

item.title: 比特币徘徊在约两周来的最低水平附近，受到 ETF 流入降温和对美联储降息幅度的担忧的影响
item.description:
Bitcoin hovered near the lowest level in about two weeks, sapped by cooling ETF inflows and worries over how much the Fed can cut interest rates https://t.co/utNrME5yMo

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 20, 2024

item.title: 据美联社报道，亿万富翁慈善家兼作家麦肯齐-斯科特（MacKenzie Scott）表示，她将向 361 家小型非营利组织捐赠 6.4 亿美元，是她通过公开征集承诺捐赠额的两倍多。
item.description:
Billionaire philanthropist and author MacKenzie Scott says she is giving $640 million to 361 small nonprofits, more than double what she pledged to give away through an open call, AP reports https://t.co/uvGEOsklQx

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 20, 2024

item.title: 澳大利亚正在为中国第二高级领导人李强总理的来访做准备，这表明堪培拉与北京之间的关系并未因最近的挫折而受到破坏
item.description:
Australia is preparing for a visit by Chinese Premier Li Qiang, the country’s second-most senior leader, in a sign that relations between Canberra and Beijing weren’t upended by recent setbacks https://t.co/Pjx6BFEaDj

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 20, 2024

item.title: 澳大利亚中央银行的改革面临脱轨风险，因为政府和反对党在新货币政策委员会的人选问题上争论不休
item.description:
The Australian central bank's overhaul is at risk of getting derailed as the government and opposition fight over who should be on the new monetary policy committee https://t.co/amPUzo5oX0

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 20, 2024

item.title: 各国央行有可能采取自 2008 年以来最同步的降息措施，这将为美元的反弹势头提供支持。
item.description:
The likelihood that central banks are about to embark upon the most synchronized reduction of interest rates since 2008 looks set to support the dollar in its nascent rebound https://t.co/g8tp3J19v2

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 20, 2024

item.title: 马来西亚表示，高盛就价值数十亿美元的 1MDB 丑闻提起的诉讼使该国有机会审查一项有争议的解决方案
item.description:
Malaysia said a lawsuit Goldman initiated involving the multibillion-dollar 1MDB scandal gives the country a chance to review a contentious settlement https://t.co/bkFin2SR4B

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 20, 2024

item.title: 印尼计划提高增值税，但几位议员要求推迟，这可能成为问题
item.description:
Indonesia’s planned increase to the value-added tax could be in question after several lawmakers called for a delay https://t.co/VDzZlqIY55

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 20, 2024

item.title: 以下是在印度即将举行的大选中试图削弱莫迪总理声望的一些主要反对党领导人
item.description:
Here are some of the key opposition leaders seeking to make a dent into PM Modi’s popularity in India's upcoming elections https://t.co/A3pvHCWZk1

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 20, 2024

item.title: 印度尼西亚国有企业 Pupuk Indonesia 将投资 60 多亿美元增加化肥供应，作为降低食品成本努力的一部分
item.description:
Indonesia’s state-owned Pupuk Indonesia will invest more than $6 billion to boost fertilizer supply as part of a bid to temper food costs https://t.co/T9EiMKM2CW

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 20, 2024

item.title: 中国中化集团购买了通过加拿大新管道运输的首批原油货物之一
item.description:
China’s Sinochem has purchased one of the first crude cargoes shipped through a new pipeline in Canada https://t.co/Fa3SNO0N3r

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 20, 2024

item.title: 国际货币基金组织（IMF）表示，随着通胀率回到目标区间，新西兰将有余地在今年晚些时候开始降息。
item.description:
New Zealand will have scope to start cutting interest rates later this year as inflation returns to its target band, the IMF said https://t.co/BNBc0pHom3

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 20, 2024

item.title: 前摩根大通银行家 Ryan Holsheimer 正在创办一家新公司，该公司将进行早期投资，并计划在未来两个月内开始筹款。
item.description:
Ex-JPMorgan banker Ryan Holsheimer is starting a new firm that will make early-stage investments and plans to start fundraising over the next two months https://t.co/txqlUEoWdN

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 20, 2024

item.title: 印度正寻求为其最新的液化天然气终端购买首批货物，因为该国的目标是在本十年内迅速增加这种燃料的消费量。
item.description:
India is looking to purchase the inaugural shipment for its latest liquefied natural gas terminal, as the nation aims to rapidly increase consumption of the fuel this decade. https://t.co/wqTRWRW2jm

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 20, 2024

item.title: 私人信贷借贷机构 Monroe Capital 正在敲定在阿布扎比设立办事处的计划，以拓展中东市场
item.description:
Private credit lender Monroe Capital is finalizing plans to establish an office in Abu Dhabi in an effort to expand into the Middle East https://t.co/5oVL1NRxkW

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 20, 2024

item.title: 在央行最近决定维持货币政策不变后，中国各银行维持基准贷款利率不变
item.description:
Chinese banks maintained their benchmark lending rates, following the central bank’s recent decision to stand pat on monetary policy https://t.co/xZC9Wjg8Mu

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 20, 2024

item.title: Astera Labs 及其投资者将在英特尔支持的人工智能基础设施公司的首次公开募股（IPO）中筹集约 7.13 亿美元，定价高于区间。
item.description:
Astera Labs and its investors are set to raise about $713 million in an IPO for the Intel-backed AI infrastructure company that priced above range. https://t.co/9YI2JAy9Vk

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 20, 2024

item.title: 日元兑欧元跌至 2008 年以来的最弱水平，原因是人们猜测日本央行在结束全球最后一次负利率政策后仍将保持宽松的货币政策
item.description:
The yen falls to the weakest level since 2008 against the euro on speculation the Bank of Japan will keep its monetary policy accommodative even after it ended the world’s last negative-interest-rate policy https://t.co/U3LEmDYTqc

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 20, 2024

item.title: 据美联社报道，俄亥俄州商人伯尼-莫雷诺赢得了该州共和党美国参议院初选，在特朗普的支持和民粹主义的呼吁下，他战胜了传统的共和党建制派
item.description:
Bernie Moreno, an Ohio businessman, won the state’s Republican US Senate primary, according to the Associated Press, prevailing over the traditionalist GOP establishment with Trump’s backing and a populist appeal https://t.co/dvyfmSkrT9

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 20, 2024

item.title: 包括恒大在内的中国陷入困境的房地产开发商下一步将何去何从？专家们在彭博中国信贷论坛上为投资者分析了风险和机遇。请关注我们的博客直播，了解最新进展。
item.description:
What's next for China's distressed property developers, including Evergrande? Experts weigh in on the risks and opportunities for investors at Bloomberg's China Credit Forum. Follow our live blog for updates. https://t.co/V2tjLeJxHR

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 20, 2024

item.title: 山姆-班克曼-弗里德说，美国检察官提议将他投入长达 50 年的监狱，这 "歪曲了现实"，并将他描绘成一个 "堕落的超级恶棍"。
item.description:
Sam Bankman-Fried said US prosecutors’ proposal to put him in prison for as long as 50 years “distorts reality” and paints him as a “depraved super-villain” https://t.co/cVD09OPjNQ

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 20, 2024

item.title: 联合健康（UnitedHealth）和西奈山医疗系统（Mount Sinai Health System）同意签订一份新的多年期合同，这将避免成千上万的纽约市民失去网络内医生的服务。
item.description:
UnitedHealth and Mount Sinai Health System agreed to a new multiyear contract that will prevent thousands of New Yorkers from losing access to their in-network doctors https://t.co/Duo8Gtt3zR

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 20, 2024

item.title: Pimco 认为，日本央行政策转变的潜在规模可能超出一些人的预期，并将重新激发人们对日本债券的兴趣。
item.description:
The potential scale of the Bank of Japan’s policy shift may be more than some are expecting and lead to renewed interest in Japanese bonds, according to Pimco https://t.co/Yq7El6ncM1

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 20, 2024

item.title: 中国股市在经历数月抛售后触底反弹，投资者正通过收益情况寻找可持续复苏的迹象
item.description:
As Chinese stocks bottom out after months of selling, investors are sifting through earnings for signs of a sustainable recovery https://t.co/vf2m20IfUr

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 20, 2024

item.title: #5Things：美联储利率决议进入倒计时。股市的亢奋涨势让同一家公司的策略师们感到困惑。日本央行结束负政策利率后日元暴跌。以下是市场动向。
item.description:
#5Things: The countdown to the Federal Reserve’s rate decision begins. The euphoric stock market rally confounds strategists within the same firm. The yen slumps after the Bank of Japan ends its negative policy rate. Here’s what’s moving markets. https://t.co/KlXJCEl3ny

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 19, 2024

item.title: 印度国家基础设施与发展融资银行计划发行高达 48 亿美元的本币债券，这家新成立的印度贷款机构旨在将其贷款发放量提高一倍以上
item.description:
National Bank for Financing Infrastructure and Development plans to raise up to $4.8 billion in local currency bonds, as the newly created Indian lender aims to more than double its loans disbursement https://t.co/dq4nypVB7O

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 19, 2024

item.title: 美联储周三可能会避免发出即将降息的信号，继续关注顽固的通胀问题，同时关注缓慢上升的失业率
item.description:
The Fed will likely avoid signaling an imminent rate cut Wednesday, staying focused on stubborn inflation while keeping an eye on the slowly rising unemployment rate https://t.co/V2rFhEVZDY

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 19, 2024
